name: Cursor AI CLI
description: Installs the Cursor AI command line client via the system Node package manager (pnpm or npm).

version.description: Version (semver or npm tag) of @cursorai/cli to install.

cacheDir.description: Directory containing cached @cursorai/cli tarballs (npm pack output).

offline.description: Avoid network requests; requires cacheDir tarballs for installation.
